info.json.Prenez le contrôle de votre serveur d'én: Take control of your Cartelectronic Wes energy server from Jeedom and you will be able to multiply its functionality. The plugin offers the possibility of using a CGX file specially designed for Jeedom and allowing to read more data than those available by default (requires access to the Wes server in FTP)
